name: IlluminateAutoAttendant
0:
”Alexa open auto attendant”
”Alexa, ask auto attendant for help going to the restroom”
”Alexa, ask auto attendant to get me a glass of water”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: auto attendant
des:
Allows residents from different types of facilities to request help from staff for a variety of tasks in an automated fashion. The resident is asked what task they need help with. After the dialogue is successful, the companion app will notify a staff member that the resident is requesting assistance. 
This skill requires you to grant the skill the requested permissions for the device location in the Alexa app. You also need to download the companion app.
The companion app will display the task required to the staff member. Without the companion app, the user will be able to use the skill to request assistance, but it won't notify a staff member.
For information on how to obtain the app, please submit a request at amazon@illuminateqb.com.
